T02D1799:35a-1: she ka tsa tu ra pra k'a ra na /
T02D1799:35a-3: dbang bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa /
T02D1799:35a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1799:35b-0: 'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag @35b 'tshal lo //
T02D1799:35b-1: dngos kun rnam dag 'od gsal rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i sku //
T02D1799:35b-2: 'gro ba 'di kun thugs rjes khyab mdzad cir yang snang ba'i sku //
T02D1799:35b-3: ma lus yul du gyur pas khams gsum ro mnyam gnyis su med //
T02D1799:35b-4: zung 'jug gzod nas dbyer med rdo rje 'chang ba de la 'dud //
T02D1799:35b-5: de yi dngos grub thob pa'i thabs ston pa / rdo rje 'chang dang tha dad med pa yi //
T02D1799:35b-6: lung dang man ngag brgyud pa ma nyams pa'i //
T02D1799:35b-7: bla ma rje btsun de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1799:35b-8: dbang bzhi'i rab tu byed pa'i gdams dag bri //
T02D1799:35b-9: rnyed dang bkur sti grags spangs byams dang ldan //
T02D1799:35b-10: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sgrol ba'i thugs rje can //
T02D1799:35b-11: rgyud dag grol bar ston par dgyes pa po //
T02D1799:35b-12: mtho dman med par kun la mnyam por gzigs //
T02D1799:35b-13: dad ldan g-yo sgyu med cing gtan dka' gtong //
T02D1799:35b-14: 'khor bas yid byung mya ngan 'das pa sgrub //
T02D1799:35b-15: sman bcud mi 'bad dus kyi bdud rnams spong //
T02D1799:35b-16: las kyi rkyen thub rtse gcig bsam gtan byed //
T02D1799:35b-17: rten dang brten med ngo bo nyid //
T02D1799:35b-18: bdag byin brlab pa'i man ngag go //
T02D1799:35b-19: dang por mandala lnga byas te //
T02D1799:35b-20: gdugs sogs me tog rin po che //
T02D1799:35b-21: kha dang mngar sogs ro drug dang /
T02D1799:35b-22: glang po rta dang rin chen khyim //
T02D1799:35b-23: brgyad khri bzhi stong chos phung po //
T02D1799:35b-24: lha ma klu sogs bu mo sdug / gnas lnga dag tu dbul bar bya //
T02D1799:35b-25: bdag byin rlogs shig gsol ba gdab //
T02D1799:35b-26: khong stong khyod kyi sku la med //
T02D1799:35b-27: bya ba la sogs tshigs bcad kyis //
T02D1799:35b-28: gsol ba gdab cing gnang ba sbyin //
T02D1799:35b-30: byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed //
T02D1799:35b-31: gzugs brnyan lus dang byang chub sems //
T02D1799:35b-32: mtshan ma dbyibs dang sbas pa yum //
T02D1799:35b-33: zhal gyis bum pas dbang bskur te //
T02D1799:35b-34: phyi yi bzhi pa grangs kyi bzhi //
T02D1799:35b-35: sbas pa'i bzhi pa dga' bral bzhi //
T02D1799:35b-36: bde chen bzhi pa 'bras bu'i bzhi //
T02D1799:35b-37: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang //
T02D1799:35b-38: yang gi sgra don kyang ldan phyir /
T02D1799:35b-39: 'di ni bde chen bzhi pa ste //
T02D1799:35b-40: dang por nga rgyal sgom du gzhug / nga ni ye nas rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1799:35b-41: gnas skabs glo bur gyis bsgribs shing //
T02D1799:35b-42: rang gi mtshan nyid ngo ma shes //
T02D1799:35b-43: dam pa'i drin gyis de mthong nas //
T02D1799:35b-44: rang gi lus la de nyid gnas //
T02D1799:35b-45: chu khams gser dang nam mkha' dra//
T02D1799:36a-0: @36a * // de ltar mos ldan blo bzang la //
T02D1799:36a-1: spro ba skyed pa'i bum pa zhal //
T02D1799:36a-2: dang po lus 'di grub pa ni //
T02D1799:36a-3: cho ga gsum dang byang chub lnga'o //
T02D1799:36a-4: pha ma'i sa bon bar do'i sems //
T02D1799:36a-5: las kyi rlung la zhon nas ni //
T02D1799:36a-6: ma rig pa yis len par byed //
T02D1799:36a-7: chags dang phrag dog dbang gis zhugs //
T02D1799:36a-8: mer mer ltar ltar yi ge lnga //
T02D1799:36a-9: gor gor mkhrang gyur mtshan ma lnga //
T02D1799:36a-10: yan lag rdzogs pa rigs lnga'i sku //
T02D1799:36a-11: sngon du shi ba chos sku ste //
T02D1799:36a-12: bar do longs spyod rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1799:36a-13: sa bon gsum 'dres zla ba yin //
T02D1799:36a-14: gnas skabs gnyis ni yi ge ste //
T02D1799:36a-15: gnas skabs gnyis ni mtshan ma yin //
T02D1799:36a-16: gcig ni sprul pa'i sku rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1799:36a-17: rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims bsrung //
T02D1799:36a-18: mgo zlum dpung zlum chos gos gyon //
T02D1799:36a-19: kham zas spangs shing bcud kyis 'tsho //
T02D1799:36a-20: thal sbyar gus pas mdo zlos byed //
T02D1799:36a-21: sa bcu'i bar du dka' thub bsrung //
T02D1799:36a-22: de nas sngags kyi spyad pa spyod //
T02D1799:36a-23: dbang thob don du gsol 'debs pa //
T02D1799:36a-24: sgyur byed rlung gis zlog par byed //
T02D1799:36a-25: bcom ldan dkyil 'khor sgor bltas te //
T02D1799:36a-26: thal sbyar gdong g-yogs bkrol bar byed //
T02D1799:36a-27: aa ham sgra sgrogs gsol ba 'debs //
T02D1799:36a-28: nga rgyal byed pa'i lha yis te //
T02D1799:36a-29: sbas pa'i yum ni bum pa'o //
T02D1799:36a-30: ku sha srung skud shis ba brjod //
T02D1799:36a-31: lhan cig skyes pa'i gnyid kyis nyal //
T02D1799:36a-32: bkra shis rdzas rnams lag thogs shing //
T02D1799:36a-33: nam mkha' ca co'i sgras bkang nas //
T02D1799:36a-35: bde legs phun sum tshogs pa brjod //
T02D1799:36a-36: chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang //
T02D1799:36a-37: dril bu ming gi dbang rnams bskur //
T02D1799:36a-38: de nyid yang ni lan gnyis brjod //
T02D1799:36a-39: zas dang mal stan nu ma dang //
T02D1799:36a-40: bshang gci la sogs brtul zhugs yin //
T02D1799:36a-41: pha dang ma yi longs spyod la //
T02D1799:36a-42: 'di yis bdag po byed pa yin //
T02D1799:36a-43: pha dang ma dang gzhan pa la //
T02D1799:36a-44: rag ma lus bar rang stobs ldan //
T02D1799:36a-45: rin chen rta dang glang po khyim //
T02D1799:36a-46: rjes su gnas nas rang dbang thob //
T02D1799:36a-48: sme sha can sogs bu mo rnams //
T02D1799:36a-49: rgyas shing smin par gyur pa la //
T02D1799:36a-50: gzhan gyis spro ba skyed byed cing //
T02D1799:36a-51: gzhan dag snyoms par 'jug pa la //
T02D1799:36a-52: dga' dang mos pas 'jug byed cing //
T02D1799:36b-0: skye'o cog ces @36b mos skyed pa //
T02D1799:36b-1: 'di ni gsang ba'i bzhi pa yin //
T02D1799:36b-2: phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig tu //
T02D1799:36b-4: snyoms par zhugs nas srub par byed //
T02D1799:36b-5: snang ba rang bzhin bcas pa nub //
T02D1799:36b-6: stong pa zhes ni brjod pa yin //
T02D1799:36b-7: sems la dmigs pa dang po'o //
T02D1799:36b-8: rtsa rnams kun kyang dung khang nas //
T02D1799:36b-9: 'dod chags chen po'i mes bzhu ste //
T02D1799:36b-10: aa badh'u t'i'i sgor zhugs shing //
T02D1799:36b-11: ksha yi sgo ni ma phye bar //
T02D1799:36b-12: mched pa rang bzhin bcas pa nub //
T02D1799:36b-13: shin tu stong pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1799:36b-14: sems la dmigs pa gnyis pa yin //
T02D1799:36b-15: ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug cing //
T02D1799:36b-16: yi ge ksha yi sgo phye ba //
T02D1799:36b-17: bde chen bde ba chen po ni //
T02D1799:36b-18: skad cig tsam la nyams myong ba //
T02D1799:36b-19: dpal du yid ches byed pa yin //
T02D1799:36b-20: log rtog mtshan ma lus 'gog / nyer thob rang bzhin dang bcas nub //
T02D1799:36b-21: stong pa chen po zhes brjod do //
T02D1799:36b-22: sems la dmigs pa gsum pa'o //
T02D1799:36b-23: gong ma de la rtog dpyod byed //
T02D1799:36b-24: glang po che yi lcags kyu 'dra //
T02D1799:36b-25: mchog dang dga' bral dbus dag tu //
T02D1799:36b-26: mtshan nyid dmigs la brtan par gyis //
T02D1799:36b-27: thun nam zla phyed zla ba lor //
T02D1799:36b-28: bskal par ye shes che la sbyor //
T02D1799:36b-29: stong pa gsum ni ro mnyam pa //
T02D1799:36b-30: thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba //
T02D1799:36b-31: sems la dmigs pa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1799:36b-32: 'di ni gsum pa'i bzhi pa yin //
T02D1799:36b-33: rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa //
T02D1799:36b-34: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1799:36b-35: dbugs gtong rngub pa ma yin te //
T02D1799:36b-36: spyan phye btsums pa ma yin no //
T02D1799:36b-37: dgye ba ma yin sgu ba min //
T02D1799:36b-38: gsung ba ma yin mi gsung min //
T02D1799:36b-39: phyir ni yul la mi dpyod cing //
T02D1799:36b-40: nang du sems la mi rtog go //
T02D1799:36b-41: sems gang gis ni byis pa rnams //
T02D1799:36b-43: sems gang gis ni rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1799:36b-44: bde gshegs gnas su skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1799:36b-45: bya ba thams cad blos btang la //
T02D1799:36b-46: gang ltar gnas pa'i don la gzhag / ma bcos pa nyid ma nor ba //
T02D1799:36b-47: bde ba chen po rang so nyid //
T02D1799:36b-48: don du snang ba rang bzhin med //
T02D1799:36b-49: dngos por gsal ba rtog pa med //
T02D1799:36b-50: chu dang rnyog ma de bzhin no //
T02D1799:36b-51: bying zhing lci ba gzengs bstod cing //
T02D1799:36b-52: 'thor zhing 'phyar ba rang sor gzhag / cung zad cung zad goms byas pas //
T02D1799:37a-0: gong nas gong du khyad par @37a * //
T02D1799:37a-2: / mthar ni mi rtog ting 'dzin dag / lhun gyis grub pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D1799:37a-3: sems kyi 'jur bu btang la gzhag / bla ma nyid kyang mnyam bzhag la //
T02D1799:37a-4: slob ma byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02D1799:37a-5: thun gyi nges pa yod min te //
T02D1799:37a-6: ji tsam gnas kyi bar du gzhag /'dod pa'i longs spyod kun bsten cing //
T02D1799:37a-7: lus kyi 'byung ba ro yang mnyam //
T02D1799:37a-8: bzhi pa'i dbang bskur cho ga'o //
T02D1799:37a-9: de yi don ni bshad bya ste //
T02D1799:37a-10: ae wam ma y'a'i yi ge bzhin //
T02D1799:37a-11: don bzhi dang ni sbyar bar bya //
T02D1799:37a-12: rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa'o //
T02D1799:37a-13: ae ni 'jug pa wam ni gnas //
T02D1799:37a-14: ma ni srung ba y'a ni grogs //
T02D1799:37a-15: ae ni las dang wam ni chos //
T02D1799:37a-16: ma ni mu dra y'a dam tshig / ae ni snang ba stong pa ste //
T02D1799:37a-17: wam ni mched pa shin tu stong //
T02D1799:37a-18: ma ni nyer thob chen po stong //
T02D1799:37a-19: y'a ni ro mnyam thams cad stong //
T02D1799:37a-20: ae ni ma thob thob par byed //
T02D1799:37a-21: wam ni thob pa brtan par byed //
T02D1799:37a-22: ma ni gong nas gong du 'gro //
T02D1799:37a-23: y'a ni tshe 'dir rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1799:37a-24: ae ni rgan po dar ma dang //
T02D1799:37a-25: gzhon dang lang tsho bab pa'o //
T02D1799:37a-26: de bzhin bad kan mkhris pa dang //
T02D1799:37a-27: rlung dang 'du ba cha mnyam pa'o //
T02D1799:37a-28: de bzhin gti mug zhe sdang dang //
T02D1799:37a-29: 'dod chags dug gsum cha mnyam pa'o //
T02D1799:37a-30: ti ba skyes bu las zin dang //
T02D1799:37a-31: gzhon pa'i don dang dpyang thag chad //
T02D1799:37a-32: go rims bzhin du shes par bya //
T02D1799:37a-33: ae ka ka la zhes pa ste //
T02D1799:37a-34: rang gi rgyud la cher te ltos //
T02D1799:37a-35: skyes bu ma bcos dang du gnas //
T02D1799:37a-36: bla ma dam pas mi rta sbyar //
T02D1799:37a-37: rang dbang med par rnam rtog phrogs //
T02D1799:37a-38: wam ni mar me rgya mtsho dang //
T02D1799:37a-39: dig pa'i rmi lam khyung chen 'dra//
T02D1799:37a-40: brtan par zung la mnyam par zhog / rjes thob bzhi ni sgyu ma bzhin //
T02D1799:37a-41: ma ni nor bu so ga'i be'u //
T02D1799:37a-43: legs par spyod la rtag tu bsrung //
T02D1799:37a-44: ya ni seng ge glang chen dang //
T02D1799:37a-45: smyon pa'am lceb pa lta bu yin //
T02D1799:37a-46: mgon po'i tsarya dus dang sbyar //
T02D1799:37a-47: sngags kyi tsarya gdod nas spyod //
T02D1799:37a-48: bzhi pa'i cho ga'i gdams pa ste //
T02D1799:37a-49: rigs dang dus dang gnas dang ni //
T02D1799:37a-50: bya ba spyod pa 'di ma nges //
T02D1799:37a-51: rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la //
T02D1799:37a-52: na so 'du ba nyon mongs sbyar //
T02D1799:37a-53: lo ni zla ba bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D1799:37a-54: bco lnga na ni mngon sangs rgyas //
T02D1799:37a-55: rten can las la brten pa ste //
T02D1799:37b-0: las @37b ni lus dag yid kyi las //
T02D1799:37b-1: de la rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin //
T02D1799:37b-2: dga' bral la ni bzhi pa brjod //
T02D1799:37b-3: sems la dmigs pa ji bzhin du //
T02D1799:37b-4: sgom pa sems la dmigs pa ste //
T02D1799:37b-5: rten can zhes ni brjod pa yin //
T02D1799:37b-6: rten med rang lus thabs ldan nam //
T02D1799:37b-8: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbab thabs sam //
T02D1799:37b-9: rnam par shes pa thod sbyor ram //
T02D1799:37b-10: yi ge h'um gi dbab thabs sam //
T02D1799:37b-11: gtum po'am mkha' 'gro'i byin rlabs sam //
T02D1799:37b-12: bla ma dus thabs bsten pas so //
T02D1799:37b-13: nyams su myong ba bzhi pa ste //
T02D1799:37b-14: rnam shes rlung dang ro gcig pa'o //
T02D1799:37b-15: ngo bo nyid ni rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1799:37b-16: yan lag bdun dang ldan pa ste //
T02D1799:37b-17: longs spyod rdzogs pa kha sbyor bde chen rang bzhin med //
T02D1799:37b-18: snying rjes nges gang rgyun mi 'chad cing 'gog pa med //
T02D1799:37b-19: lha la dmigs shing 'dod la spyod //
T02D1799:37b-20: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyu ru bshad //
T02D1799:37b-21: las kyi phyag rgya rang 'od yum //
T02D1799:37b-22: ye shes phyag rgyas rgyas btab cing //
T02D1799:37b-23: dkyil 'khor sgrub dang dbang gnyis dus //
T02D1799:37b-24: tshogs dang spyod pa ro mnyam dus //
T02D1799:37b-25: yum dang bcas pa'i rgyu ru bshad //
T02D1799:37b-26: bde la stong pas rgyas btab cing //
T02D1799:37b-27: ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D1799:37b-28: lha dang mi yi bde ba las //
T02D1799:37b-29: bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi //
T02D1799:37b-30: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
T02D1799:37b-31: dngos don rang gi mtshan nyid las //
T02D1799:37b-32: gud na yod pa ma yin na //
T02D1799:37b-33: lha sogs ye shes snang ba las //
T02D1799:37b-34: gzhan du dmigs pa smos ci dgos //
T02D1799:37b-35: chu yi nang gi zla ba ni //
T02D1799:37b-36: bden pa ma yin brdzun pa min //
T02D1799:37b-38: rang bzhin med lugs de ltar snang //
T02D1799:37b-39: rnam dag tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang //
T02D1799:37b-40: smon lam snying rje gang ba'i rgyu //
T02D1799:37b-41: thog mtha' med pa'i rdo rje sems //
T02D1799:37b-42: dus dang phyogs ris rnam par spangs //
T02D1799:37b-43: chu bo'i gzhung ltar rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D1799:37b-45: nyon mongs la sogs 'dod lnga rnams //
T02D1799:37b-46: ma bkag bde chen rgyan du shes //
T02D1799:37b-48: bde chen bde ba chen po'i sku //
T02D1799:37b-49: rang snang rig mas nyer brgyan pa //
T02D1799:37b-50: 'og min gnas su dus rtag tu //
T02D1799:37b-51: mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar bas bzhugs //
T02D1799:38a-2: mos pa'i dbang gis tha dad pa //
T02D1799:38a-3: sems can rnams ni 'dul bar mdzad //
T02D1799:38a-4: rgyud gzhan dag las bshad pa ni /
T02D1799:38a-5: spang bya gsum dang ma rig pa //
T02D1799:38a-6: sbyong byed smin byed dbang bzhi'o //
T02D1799:38a-7: grol byed rgyud dang sngags dang chos //
T02D1799:38a-8: gsang ba'i rim pas bzhi par 'dod //
T02D1799:38a-9: 'di nyid yi ge spyi dang sbas //
T02D1799:38a-10: mthar thug yin pas bzhi par 'dod //
T02D1799:38a-11: mkha' 'dra chos sku stong pa las //
T02D1799:38a-13: rlung dang ye shes ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D1799:38a-14: 'bad dang bral bas lhun gyis grub //
T02D1799:38a-15: dka' thub dka' spyad 'dir mi dgos //
T02D1799:38a-16: dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pa //
T02D1799:38a-17: lus skams nas ni sems gdungs nas //
T02D1799:38a-18: sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig byed par zad //
T02D1799:38a-19: khrus dang gtsang spras gdung ba skyed //
T02D1799:38a-20: 'dod pa lnga ni ma spangs par //
T02D1799:38a-21: dka' thub kyis ni ma gdungs par //
T02D1799:38a-23: bskal pa grangs med gsum du ni //
T02D1799:38a-24: lus dang srog la ma bltas kyang //
T02D1799:38a-25: bde ba chen po rnyed par dka' //
T02D1799:38a-26: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje ye shes kyi //
T02D1799:38a-27: dbang bskur bzhi pa'i gdams pa byas pa yin //
T02D1799:38a-28: 'gro kun byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mthong nas ni //
T02D1799:38a-29: zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob bar
T02D1799:38a-30: shog / dbang bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa slob
T02D1799:38a-31: dpon n'a g'a rdzu nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
